ygData.subject: Re: Phobia is now a free agent
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Sorry about the missle thing, I didnt realize you were landed. ... Hell Beast. He still hadnt figured out why. but for now he was free of the Predacons

OOC: Sorry about the missle thing, I didnt realize you were landed.

~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast ::: Well Damn it! The Maximals have a new base! And the Ark!

::: He slams his fists down, and hopes Rat Trap is doing his mission. :::

~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Rat Trap makes his way to the ark, injured from a brutal beating from 
Hell Beast. He still hadnt figured out why. but for now he was free of the 
Predacons and ready to be come a Maximal. From what he saw, the Ark was crap, 
but the new cruiser looked excellent. Rat Trap, now changed from Predacon to 
Maximal, sent a distress signal to the Maximals. He was dying, and he needed 
help. The Predacons turned there backs on him, and he needed a good home. :::

~~~~~~~~

::: Inferno and Jackle watch the Maximal cruiser with great curiosity. They 
saw it set down, and make contact. But did Hell Beast know about it? :::

::: Inferno ::: The Royalty will be very displeased! We should burn this new 
colony to the ground!

::: Jackle ::: Its not that simple. That ship is new, a virgin to this war. 
We might take a few cracks at it, but besides that...look, theres Rat Trap!

::: Inferno ::: Traitor! He will burn!

::: Jackle ::: Leave him, Hell Beast beat the crap out of him, hes a goner. 
Lets go.

::: The two Predacons make there way home when they discover Gangon. Inferno 
bends down to help him. :::

::: Inferno ::: We will take you home to the colony!

~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Megatron curls his lips at the new Maximal base. Ra and Waspinator stood 
behinde him as they watched it from the cover of bushes. :::

::: Megatron ::: This war is getting ridiculos! I say we up the odds a bit, 
yes.

::: Ra ::: What did you have in mind?

::: Megatron ::: I do belive a trip to the Ark is in order. Ha ha ha!

~~~~~~~~~

::: Ominus Prime and Set stare at the consol with the new Maxi base. They 
didnt like it, but at least it was a new target. :::
